Posts.Title: New to site and scared

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by invasiveductal I would try to find a wig salon if you have it there. Human hair lace wigs are expensive but they def look more natural and with everything going on, at least having a wig that makes you feel look closest to yourself helps a lot psychologically. This is exactly what my best friends Mother did, and for the same reasons.
